Setting.Name: PrimaryGSheetKey
Setting.Description: The primary (default) Google Sheet Key (with infered gid of 0)

Setting.Name: DisplayName
Setting.Description: A "friendly" display name for the project which can be changed at any time.

Setting.Name: BaseNamespace
Setting.Description: A reasonable base Namespace (to be used as a base namespace for code)

Setting.Name: ChameleonCodeHostUri
Setting.Description: The root path to the SDK Doc Host

Setting.Name: ChameleonCodeSDKUri
Setting.Description: The relative path within the dochost

Setting.Name: ChameleonCodeSDKPath
Setting.Description: The physical path to the doc host folder relative to the CODEE_ROOT_PATH

AdditionalResource.Name: Settings
AdditionalResource.Description: Global settings for the entire TicTacToe project

AdditionalResource.Name: AdditionalResources
AdditionalResource.Description: A list of additional resources used by the project

AdditionalResource.Name: Entities
AdditionalResource.Description: A list of entities in the project (Player, Opponent, Game, Mark, Win, Loss, etc)

AdditionalResource.Name: RevenueOpportunity
AdditionalResource.Description: List of ways that this could be monotized

Entity.Name: AppUser
Entity.Description: A user within the app

Entity.Name: GeographicLocation
Entity.Description: A location (with a longitude/latitude)

Entity.Name: GeographicLocationType
Entity.Description: A type of location (park, field, room, business, landmark,etc)

Entity.Name: Puzzle
Entity.Description: A clue, or puzzle in a game

Entity.Name: TreasureHunt
Entity.Description: A game with a specific start date, and list of "clues"

Entity.Name: CharacterProfile
Entity.Description: A description of a specific user, which is based on a Character, but has been "customized" in some way

Entity.Name: CharacterTemplate
Entity.Description: A character (with a particular vice)

Entity.Name: LocalBusiness
Entity.Description: A business which is somehow involved in the the hunt

Entity.Name: ClueDestination
Entity.Description: A destination for a particular clue

Entity.Name: Vice
Entity.Description: A list of vices

Entity.Name: UserVerificationRequest
Entity.Description: A user requests verification of a clue

Entity.Name: UserAnswer
Entity.Description: An answer to a specific

Entity.Name: CorrectAnswer
Entity.Description: A correct answer for a Clue

Entity.Name: GpsLocation
Entity.Description: A specific GpsPoint, with a radious. Same as Georgraphical Location

Entity.Name: Risk
Entity.Description: Different kinds of risk which would probably require insurance

Entity.Name: App
Entity.Description: The App

Entity.Name: StoryDevelopment
Entity.Description: This is a basically what Olivia and Theo have been doing today

Entity.Name: GameRecharge
Entity.Description: A game induced delay in play of some kind, which

Entity.Name: Read
Entity.Description: A type of action?

Entity.Name: CrypticDirection
Entity.Description: A cryptic version of a clue

Entity.Name: PuzzleQuestion
Entity.Description: A question

Entity.Name: VideoGame
Entity.Description: A type of challenge?

Entity.Name: PhysicalAction
Entity.Description: Some physical action which must be takne plac

Entity.Name: RevenueOpportunity
Entity.Description: Different ways that this model could be monitized

Entity.Name: PrizeLevel
Entity.Description: A level of primary (1st, 2nd, 3rd, general, etc)

Entity.Name: Prize
Entity.Description: A prize

Entity.Name: SubjectMatter
Entity.Description: Content for a particular Treasure Hunt (or might be shared

Entity.Name: MultipleChoiceAnswer
Entity.Description: A possible answer to a multiple choice question

Entity.Name: CodeVerification
Entity.Description: A verification code

Entity.Name: Cheating
Entity.Description: Do we want to formally track cheating? It's pretty central

Entity.Name: Website
Entity.Description: A website with information on it

Entity.Name: Room
Entity.Description: Is this just a type of GeorgraphicLocation

Entity.Name: Talk
Entity.Description: A type of action?

Entity.Name: Experiment
Entity.Description: An experiment?

Entity.Name: Bound
Entity.Description: A boundary for a particular area

Entity.Name: Sector
Entity.Description: A georgraphica location

Entity.Name: VerificationRequest
Entity.Description: A veritifcation reqeust

RevenueOpportunity.Name: ClueSponsor
RevenueOpportunity.Description: Clue sponsorship (could dictate what subject matter the clue requires knowledge of)

RevenueOpportunity.Name: RechargeSponsor
RevenueOpportunity.Description: Choose recharging stations according to highest bidder

RevenueOpportunity.Name: BuyGems
RevenueOpportunity.Description: Users could buy additional code verifications (if they think they interpreted the clue right, but got it wrong, they could buy extras so they can try again)

RevenueOpportunity.Name: SkipRecharge
RevenueOpportunity.Description: Users could pay to recharge instead of going to recharging spot
